value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Here...in the innermost sanctum...
We'll find the weapon we seek.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A blood temple... How ghastly!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Hurry now. Before we're beset by
another distraction.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hold, Princess Veronica. Do not
enter the temple just yet...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Why not?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Thrasir—the other Princess
Veronica—has told us Hel
cannot be killed.$k$pThere is no doubt she has deduced
that we seek this weapon.$k$pYet the information about it remained
in the Library of Embla. She neither
hid nor destroyed it...$k$pThat can mean only one thing.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|This is a trap?$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|And yet you still came.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|You're right. The weapon is not here.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You tricked us.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|I know your thoughts as though
they are my own, you little fool.$k$pBecause they are.$k$pBut you, Prince Alfonse... If you
suspected the truth, why did you
come?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|To spring your trap. I knew you
would be certain to come and
verify our demise.$k$pInstead, I have the chance I've been
waiting for—to defeat one of Hel's
generals.$k$pThrasir, general of the realm of the
dead... You will fall here.$k$p

$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|You may bare your fangs...but
you'll be the ones dying here.$k$pHel cannot be killed, after all.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Why do you aid Hel? She should
be your enemy as much as ours!$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|My goal is the same as your own.
By defeating Hel, you save your
world...$k$pBut my world has already been
destroyed.$k$pWho, then, can save it?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|The answer is "no one." Am I wrong?$k$pThat is why Alfonse and I have
no choice but to kill you all.$k$pIf we destroy your world, Hel will
return ours to the way it was...$k$pThis is a fight to the death—for all
of us.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06B,0|$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother... I have failed you.$k$pI promised you...and yet...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Veronica...$k$p$EFace|I feel no compassion for you at all.$k$pOnly one of us could live...$k$pI will promise you this, though: I will
kill Hel.$k$p$Sbs150|
